website_summaries.verdict: The Netatmo Presence shows a lot of promise when it comes to advanced motion detection, but it's too expensive and its design is too distinctive for it to have broad appeal.
pros: Netatmo's $300 Presence outdoor security camera and floodlight successfully distinguishes among motion from cars, people and animals (most of the time)
Its push alerts are prompt, the built-in microSD card records locally for free and you can automatically save video clips to your Dropbox account or FTP server
cons: The Presence costs 100 bucks more than competing products
Its bold, modern design won't appeal to everyone
I wish it worked with more smart home platforms
It wasn't particularly easy to install, either

customer_reviews.title: Back to surprises at my doorway
customer_reviews.text: The alert system is really accurate. I am no longer surprised by deliveries left sitting out in zero degree weather all day. Easy to set up and maintain. Okay. Here’s my update. My glowing recommendation has just disappeared. Apparently fog and humid weather destroys the sd card. Not happy with this at all since Michigan is nothing if not humid most of the year. My recommendation has just turned to ‘don’t bother with this one’.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: Not actually weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these cameras less than two years ago. Two are protected enough that they never get rained on, and they're still functioning. The other two were not quite as protected and were exposed to the very infrequent rains of Southern California - both have failed, and because I bought them on Amazon, both are out of warranty. It's pretty clear that the product is not actually weatherproof. I'm not sure what I'm going to do - I can't stomach replacing these at such a high price, especially since they're likely to fail the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Moving branches are mistaken as a moving car, which triggers a notification. Night vision works somewhat as long as the white LED flood light is not turned on. Customer service is simply disastrous. The SD card failed after roughly 6 months and I replaced it, The glass cover of the LED flood light became lose, which caused humidity to leak into the camera. Ultimately the cover glass fell off, which is not further surprising as it is only attached 1/16th inch wide double-sided tape. Any of a total of 4 attempts to reach customer service to at least replace the cover glass resulted in nothing. No response whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far. Hoping for new style variants, and the Homekit Secure Video update
customer_reviews.text: Can't emphasize enough the comfort of knowing when someone walks up the drive. Mounted under the house eve upside down, the Netatmo has been recording delivery people, knight critters, and vehicles and identifying each pretty reliably while pushing out a notification we get on each Apple Watch. The only improvements I could list: • The contemporary style, which might contrast with your home. • Mounting it upside down exposes the open bottom in an upward position, which concerns me about where blown water or debris might build up (inside the housing?) • Want to see the Homekit Secure Video feature implemented. Netatmo has done a great job and I hope they are able to complete the long-ago-announced doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Brutusfly

customer_reviews.title: Great product when it works
customer_reviews.text: Had to return twice, because the light would come on in response to motion but the camera wouldn't switch from night vision to day/colored camera. They finally gave up and just refunded my money on the last one which was nice but i still have a camera that won't work properly. It doesn't play nice with Apple Homekit or Alexa, frequently disconnects and sometimes takes several attempts to restart/reset/reconnect. It's a great concept but needs some upgrades, I'd keep looking if I were you....
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Archer

customer_reviews.title: Waited to long...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my original cameras from a brand that had been promising HomeKit support for years with a firmware update. These cameras give me the opportunity to view on my Apple tv’s and my Google Assistants. They look good and also allow me to store footage locally on sd card or through my ftp server! Setup was extremely simple. The color code for the wires are European but the instructions identify the hot and neutral connection for US installation. Only setback is that you have to go back after a couple days and check the screws for adjustments. They seem to loosen up after initial install but remain solid after that.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: 1 - Ability to upload files to FTP (to my NAS) as well as an option for uploads to Dropbox 2 - Replacing an existing light fixtu
customer_reviews.text: I decided to pick this device based on the following abilities over it's competitors: 1 - Ability to upload files to FTP (to my NAS) as well as an option for uploads to Dropbox 2 - Replacing an existing light fixture provided constant power without running additional wiring I am happy with the device, as it has met all of my expectations. Push notifications with screenshots to my Apple Watch are very convenient. There does appear to be about a 14 second delay when comparing Live recording to real-time actions. Though the device isn't perfect, it fit my needs / criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnected
customer_reviews.text: I have two of the Presence and one Welcome. They are hit and miss at best. I would, or will never, rely on them for security as they connect/disconnect multiple times per day. I cant imagine I have three defective cameras, they are simply inadequate. I use an Orbi system, but had on a Netgear router before the Orbi and they all three did the same thing. Even when they work, they do not record events consistently. I would not recommend these cameras, even though I had high hopes in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Candle Fire

customer_reviews.title: Great needs to be close to your network
customer_reviews.text: The motion light is very bright and works well. I’m disappointed with the way motion detection works. It catches the motion and then takes a photo of the motion a bit late causing you to miss a vehicle or see just the back of a vehicle. I’m still trying to figure out its interaction with Apple home. And lens flares pop up a lot
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Linder

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Set up took a little longer then what they said, but got it up and running. I had to get a network booster so our wireless network reached the camera but it has worked well for the last couple of months. Motion detection is great and it does very well in noting car, people, animal distinction. A lot of the quality depends on your network connection/speed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and you can have it save the video to your PC via FTP server freeware.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like that I can set it to turn the light on only when it recognizes a person or car via the IR vision. Recognition accuracy is excellent. Video quality is good. It is also very cool that you can set up an FTP server application on your PC (FileZilla Server in my case) and have the video stored to your local PC rather than paying a monthly service fee. Score one for NETATMO. The appearance is obviously rather modern, and definitely is out of place on my Texas brick luxo-pad unfortunately. However as some indicated, there is normally about a 10-15 second delay before presence indication is received on the phone app.
customer_reviews.author: KrisS

customer_reviews.title: I like NetAtmo products in general
customer_reviews.text: I like NetAtmo products in general. This device works as advertised. Installation was straightforward. Setup had some hiccups but worked fine (hint: once connected to WiFi give it sometime to update to the latest firmware which solves many issues in older firmwares in case your device come with an older firmware). The detection seems to be accurate most of the time. The floodlight is bright and provides good lighting at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The Netatmo Presence will no longer connect to HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Until a few weeks ago the Netatmo Presence had been working beautifully. However, it no longer connects to Apple’s HomeKit. It still works fine in its own app. So rather issue lies in the HomeKit integration. I hope they get it fixed because that was the primary reason I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Only one of two worked, which stopped working in less than one year.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome in concept, however the three tech savvy adults of this family could only get one of the two units to initially work and only keep one of the units working for <12 months. I can bore you with details, but you'd get the jest that you'll be spending hours on your ladder trying time consuming and expensive memory card solutions. 'I even tried weather proofing these cameras before installation, but its obvious they aren't built for for the outdoors. Despite the high initial cost, I'm writing this one off and I encourage you to READ the reviews before taking a purchase based on inexplicably high average reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: NO browser support. NO Windows support.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cam but one of the MAIN reasons I bought it was the web app browser viewing. It states on the company website BROWSER SUPPORT Web app available for the two latest versions of: Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer After I installed it and was setting it up I find out this is a false statement. It does not have a web app or have browser support. Guess you can't believe the manufacturers websites anymore! They really need to get off their assets and come up with Windows or browser viewing support. It's not really that hard. And what they charge for this camera they should be able to afford to do this. Ron Knapik
customer_reviews.author: RFK

customer_reviews.title: Good traction right out of the gate
customer_reviews.text: Good video, bright light, next I will test-drive in potential locations, good advice to check WiFi reception before hardwire installation, but I have learned about WiFi extenders/repeaters and to place them up high as possible (like a cell tower) to avoid all the metal appliances/drywall/electrical conduit interference. Just practicing prudence, not paranoia, hahahoho....
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Drops connection often.  Very difficult to change WiFi networks.  No support available
customer_reviews.text: Support is sketchy at best with little to no technical advice other than what is already on website. These cameras work great as floodlights, but drop connection often when using WiFi. They require resetting with QR code cards which are mandatory and made of cardboard. No HomeApp code is included for use with Apple HomeKit Next few generations will probably be better
customer_reviews.author: Expert

customer_reviews.title: No fees. Works well. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Nice audio. Dropbox option to save and send is great. The camera detects people vs cars vs animals as described. I had a slight issue getting started. I had to replace the factory SD card with a new one. Also needed to upgrade my wifi to mesh to have a strong enough signal. Now everything works great. I love the contemporary styling for my home.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Security camera and so far has worked perfectly. Videos are clear and load quickly. It’s smart enough to ignore cars and animals that get picked up by the camera. The flood light works great. The app is easy to use and works reliably. I love that I can see who comes and goes in real time whether I’m at home or out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The Netatmo Presence is awesome. I didn't have any issues hooking it up to power, and it works very well. I especially like that you can set up multiple zones -- say you only want the pathway to your house to trigger an alert, but not the garden area next to it -- and adjust the sensitivity. That's a great feature. I wish it could do facial recognition of individual people, but maybe sort of thing is a few years away still. Not sure. Anyway, I'll be buying another one of these for my backyard. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great but you'll need this tip.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 Netatmos. The facial recognition and various software features and options are just great. This is THE camera for automation nerds like me. Some issues with set up though. I have learned to do the set up VERY close to the Wi Fi source first. After successfully completing set up, including naming the cam and saving, then install it in it's final location. Otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Netatmo Presence
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cameras for my property and found the Netatmo Presence. The fact that it replaced an existing fixture and had a flood light made the decision simple. The install was straight forward, as long as you have some basic electrical knowledge, and they work great. The person/car/animal recognition works amazingly well! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: For me the best webcam
customer_reviews.text: I own more than a dozen of those webcams and use them for vacation homes in different countries. For me they work perfect. The only problem you will find are the SD cards. But this has nothing to do with the camera. It,s just the life of a SD card which is unfortunately limited. I had to change two, one after two and the other after three years. And guess what: it happened exactly the wrong time when you where not at the location when it happened.
customer_reviews.author: ZACK

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there for hard wired camera and light
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will with very little fuss. I had it installed in an hour and it has worked great ever since. Motion detection needs a lot of work. Would not buy this if you're hoping to only get real notifications of intruders on your property. I get 20+ false detections a day even after "training" it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: having a hard time with it going off line. ...
customer_reviews.text: having a hard time with it going off line...looked it up and they are aware of the problem...hoping to have it fixed
customer_reviews.author: tenabunny

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great camera, but cannot recognise faces during night vision.
customer_reviews.author: mlouis

customer_reviews.title: Best HomeKit Camera/Floodlight
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a HomeKit Camera with a built in light, this is the best that’s out there. This light is much brighter than the Ring equivalent. And since it stores all your videos on the camera itself (I also have mine set up to upload to Dropbox), there’s no after-sale subscription costs. The deeper integration with HomeKit in iOS13 is going to make these cameras even better.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Probably couldn't have chosen a better product
customer_reviews.text: Plainly, this camera system is a winner. Expensive, but dependable and with useful settings and a great interface for reviewing details . I do feel more secure with this installed - grateful. Please keep working well!
customer_reviews.author: once in a blue moon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing  security camera with free person detection
customer_reviews.text: what an amazing product i now own 3 after testing 1 .. the person/animal/car recognition is free which is great camera is not 4k but u save on data and picks up motion very well even if little pixelated from slow internet .. i dont mind i just want to know if somone is there.. so it does its job very well
customer_reviews.author: Danny Havenga

customer_reviews.title: No go for my home.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light camera but never saw it operational except in video. Requires a specific place for install like a light sconce. Best for backyard. Front porch not so much. My porch does not have wall sconce to replace. Plus better with electrician. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: The app solicited me to leave this review, which I am happy to do. I’m just not one for droning on and on. And i’m sure there is plenty one could find fault with on this product. Haters gonna hate. But wireless security cameras are an “emerging” technology, and cameras that place nicely with HomeKit fall somewhere between spotted owls and unicorns.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for driveway surveillance
customer_reviews.text: Readily recognizes people, cars and animals. A few false Id’s on windy days. Not being an electrician, it took some juggling to get this installed while standing on a ladder. Following directions, it worked as advertised. Installed for about a month now and am very satisfied with it’s performance.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Camera w/No Monthly Fee Required.
customer_reviews.text: Software: Best software/recognition for filtering down to just the notifications you want to see. Can set to only flag people and at certain times of night so you don't end up turning off notifications due to to many False positives. Hardware: Floodlight could be brighter. Camera/picture quality is amazing. On device storage makes this the only camera/flood that can function without a monthly service.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Nest!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to swap my Nest Cam for the Netatmo Presence after it was recommended to me by a friend. I was very happy with my Nest but I was tired of the pricy monthly subscription which the Netatmo camera doesn’t have. The Netatmo camera is a little more expensive but the video storage is entirely free, which is such an advantage compared to most security cameras... All the videos are stored on the included SD card. I also chose to back them up to my Dropbox just in case. It works perfectly. This is a great product, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: martinot

customer_reviews.title: ... for 7 months in all types weather Chicago area annoying if you are working in it's tracking window keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised I have had in use for 7 months in all types weather Chicago area annoying if you are working in it's tracking window keeps notifiying you of your self I have 3 welcome cameras and there complete weather stations good quality and support
customer_reviews.author: audigo

customer_reviews.title: An incredible HomeKit security device!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this camera. I believe this type of technology is going to make old school cameras totally obsolete. If you have Apple products in your house, you would be crazy to get any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stone

customer_reviews.title: been a fan after a month without conection i regret it, better buy kuna... more simpler
customer_reviews.text: almost imposible to reset it and horrible custumer support, the site wont help you straigth forward with simple directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera even though a little big
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera even though it is a little big
customer_reviews.author: Helena E. Foster Fabiano

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great light/camera. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but great light/camera. Easy to install. Perfect outdoor sensor light replacement. Good monitoring performance (alerts not too often but catches what's needed). IOS app is good - and you can upload videos to Dropbox. Needs good wifi signal, especially for set up. Next generation could benefit from ac wireless (and RTSP streaming but most people won't need or care about that).
customer_reviews.author: Mr W Foster

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Security with No subscription fees!
customer_reviews.text: Netatmo's outdoor security camera not only detects people, cars and animals, but you can also zone it to specific areas around your home. It serves as a flood light with Infrared technology and can be controlled via my Netatmo Security App. No subscription fees!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Presence camera at home. I bought this one after being very satisfied with the previous 2. I also own a Welcome indoor camera and it also works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: ... flying bugs with "person seen" - but otherwise a great product - it's been fun watching the wildlife go ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it confuses close flying bugs with "person seen" - but otherwise a great product - it's been fun watching the wildlife go by at our back door.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor light and camera
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few dogs. It is good that the light does not turn on every time the dogs walk in front of the camera(not perfect). Very useful when arriving home in the dark with the camera recognising humans and turning on the light(reliable). Camera is of good quality, useful to take a look outside if the dogs are barking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poor quality and loading speed
customer_reviews.text: I have four of them but they take too long to load the picture, when they do and most like it will disconnect you!! No customer service unfortunately!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Lanfredi

customer_reviews.title: Work really well.
customer_reviews.text: Activity detection works really well. Not perfect but pretty good compare to dumb security cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Herve

customer_reviews.title: Netatmo makes great products.
customer_reviews.text: Nice view of my backyard. The deer love the garden. Works great with HomeKit. Recovers on its own after power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, good features
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with a simple interface. I’ve had several cameras without computer vision that capture motion like crazy. This one gets the footage I actually care about. HomeKit integration is great. No subscription nonsense like everybody else.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, and what I love most about it is that my information is mine, and I don't have to pay a subscription to access my videos. The only downside to this camera is that it does not allow you to speak through it. If they added that feature, this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: reviewed

customer_reviews.title: A very attractive mediocre thing, dark web
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. A very good looking enclosure. The light is harsh but also not as bright as you would want. Syncing over FTP is a bummer, no support for SFTP or SSH. So you're paying for Dropbox forever. Support is just ok. The iOS app is just ok. Once a week the camera crashes or drops off the network. Power cycling works but if you're not home, you know, when you need the camera to work, and it goes dark, well, now what? Kind of also just assume this thing is streaming my back yard to the dark web.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B.

customer_reviews.title: It works and I can see it around the globe
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and this product works great, its lets me know what is going in my house around the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Carral Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor camera by far
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best outdoor camera- we tried a few - the ability to detect cars, animals and people works great - support good and easy to use - updated after 12 months - still the best
customer_reviews.author: David Keane

customer_reviews.title: Best camera out there
customer_reviews.text: Best camera out there! I own an arlo and ring camera system. I'd rank them Netatmo, ring then arlo.
customer_reviews.author: snake_eyes

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty solid security cam.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. Sometimes the camera occasionally puts out false positives and incorrect movement type classification. I would prefer if the mounting angle was wider, and some UI issues, but not a deal breaker. Requires some finesse with electrical wiring and if your junction box isn't recessed inside the wall you can mount Presence on top just fine. I recommend assigning a static IP to Presence through your router using the MAC address. Cuz even if Presence loses its WIFI connection it can still reconnect relatively fast when the WIFI is back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera for Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.text: This camera and floodlight works great. Light is nice and bright and image is very clear. Elegant design and no subscriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Heinze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Works with Dropbox and local ftp server.
customer_reviews.author: happyusa98001

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but....
customer_reviews.text: I never got mine to work it was DOA. Luckily I tested prior to Hard Wiring. There is no AC adapter, you connect three wires to the back. It is a great idea, i loved everything I read sbout it, but when I received a non functional one, my opinion was not to get a replacement. Why, if longevity is not good i will either have an ugly ornament on wall or a hole in my brick house entrance. Back to Trivision..
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Christopher Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup and reliable on cell phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: FrE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Works effortlessly. I have had no issues since installing.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am truly happy with my security system. It even gave me alerts when I was 400 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Brommels

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works. Easy setup. Watching my house in Virginia from Norway.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Be sure you have a good wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Be sure you have a good wireless router and internet speeds for optimal response.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbalee Kareema Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have two of them, I check them all the time. At the end of the day I review it to see what all happened throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great image--if you can get it too your computer
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set up and obstinately refuses to maintain a connection in a wireless heavy neighborhood. With everyone around engaging in electronic warfare--buying increasingly powerful wireless boosters to overcome the neighbor's more powerful booster, this poor thing does not stand a chance. I recommend something with coax or CAT-5.
customer_reviews.author: W G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working great. The only issue I'm having is sending me too many notifications in short periods.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman Alamri

customer_reviews.title: So far, so "slow".
customer_reviews.text: So far, so "slow". I bought this as a more reasonable option to my current AXIS and OPTEX laser scanner setup. The only issue is by the time its detected a person,car,animal etc and told you on your phone, its already 20 seconds behind. That doesn't do it for things like presence when you are home, only presence after the fact. Anyone else have similar performance issues ?
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Landy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy .no support being provided by company
customer_reviews.text: Editing my review as netatmo has stopped responding to any support requests .if u buy this u will not get any support.my camera floodlight stopped working after one and a half year by itself and netatmo has completely washed their hands off any responsibility to it .all LED lights have atleast a 5 year warranty on them but netatmo will provide only a 1 year warranty on their floodlight cam which had costed me almost 300 dollars.this seems to becoming more of a scam now .no warranty , no support . Lot of detection lag in camera .slow live view upload .better to invest in nestcam or arlo these may not have floodlights but support is very good.
customer_reviews.author: ankush

customer_reviews.title: fairly good automatic detection of people & cars (some false alarms
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, fairly good automatic detection of people & cars (some false alarms, but not too many). App is not as impressive as the hardware (occasional high latency in receiving alerts / loading thumbnails) but works for my purpose. Overall a much better experience using Presence than Welcome.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: When sd card fails everything stops working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month or so, but now I have an SD card issue and the whole thing no longer works. Support is taking forever to send me another one, so in the mean time the device is utterly useless, just blank - ridiculous. When it was working the issues are the fov is too narrow and the monitoring zones can only be squares. This is frustrating since the lense distorts the picture to make my fence look like an arch and you can't draw an arch to be monitored.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this security dystem for home security but instead I have pair it with solar and a hotspot. It helps provide eyes on our rural property. Simple to set up and performs exceptionally. Clear video that is highest when downloaded
customer_reviews.author: Renee C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great camera. Love it and very useful. Bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: requires ios 10.x or greater for app. you MUST use app to setup camera.
customer_reviews.text: requires ios 10.x or greater for app. you MUST use app to setup camera. I'm stuck deciding whether to send it back or not. I like my ios 9.x and do not want to change.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Knight

product_meta.title: Smart Outdoor Security Camera with Integrated floodlight - NOC01-US
product_meta.description:
Style:Outdoor CameraHave alerts sent directly to your smartphone when an intruder or vehicle enters your property
Unlike conventional cameras which notify you whenever they detect movement, Presence can distinguish between people, cars and animals. Presence will tell you if someone is loitering around your home, if a car enters your driveway or if animals are in the garden.
Every home is unique. With Presence, you receive customised notifications that match your needs. You can choose to be alerted instantly when someone enters a zone you have selected. You can also choose not to receive alerts for animals. The Alert-Zones feature allows you to select specific areas for alerts if the camera detects a person, animal or car.
Presence protects you day and night, thanks to its built-in smart floodlight. The light can be switched on manually in the app or set to come on when it detects a person, car or animal. It helps you find your way safely at night and deters any unwanted visitors.
Simply install Presence in place of an outdoor light fixture or set it up wherever is best for you (entrance to you home, garden, etc.).
In just a few minutes, you can install your very own sophisticated security system, complete with powerful floodlight. Your property is now protected against break-ins!
Specifications:
-Video sensor: 4 MP
-Full HD: up to 1920 x 1080
-Field of view: 100°
- LED floodlight: 12 W, variable brightness
- Infrared night vision, detection up to 15 m
-Local data storage: MicroSD (8 GB Class 10 card included)
- 100-240 V power supply
- Wi-Fi: 802.11 b/g/n (2.4 GHz)
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR PROPERTY: receive instant alerts on your smartphone to let you know what is happening outside your home
DETER UNWANTED VISITORS DAY AND NIGHT: the smart floodlight switches on when needed to deter unwanted visitors
RECEIVE CUSTOM ALERTS: Presence distinguishes between people, cars and animals and will only provide updates on what you choose to monitor
CHOOSE WHEN TO RECEIVE ALERTS: select the part of your garden and the events for which you wish to receive notifications
ROUND-THE-CLOCK SECURITY: use the app to watch Full HD footage of what happens outside your home, 24/7.iOS 10 minimum required
FREE VIDEO STORAGE: store your videos at no additional cost and stream them whenever you want

EFFORTLESS TO INSTALL: simply install the Presence security camera in place of an outdoor light fixture or set it up wherever is best for you (entrance to your home, garden, etc.) Android 5.0 minimum required, available for the two latest versions of Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer.
